request.description:
# Expense Group Creation

This endpoint allows the creation of a new expense group.

## Request Body

- `paid_by` (array): An array of objects representing the users who have paid for the expense, along with the amount they have paid.
    
    - `user` (number): The user ID.
        
    - `amount` (number): The amount paid by the user.
        
- `shared_by` (array): An array of objects representing the users with whom the expense is shared, along with the amount they are responsible for.
    
    - `user` (number): The user ID.
        
    - `amount` (number): The amount shared by the user.
        
- `amount` (number): The total amount of the expense.
    
- `title` (string): The title of the expense group.
    
- `description` (string): A description of the expense group.
    

## Response

- `id` (number): The ID of the created expense group.
    
- `paid_by` (array): An array of objects representing the users who have paid for the expense in the created group, along with their respective details.
    
    - `id` (number): The ID of the payment record.
        
    - `user` (number): The user ID.
        
    - `created_at` (string): The timestamp of creation.
        
    - `updated_at` (string): The timestamp of the last update.
        
    - `amount` (string): The amount paid by the user.
        
- `shared_by` (array): An array of objects representing the users with whom the expense is shared in the created group, along with their respective details.
    
    - `id` (number): The ID of the sharing record.
        
    - `user` (number): The user ID.
        
    - `created_at` (string): The timestamp of creation.
        
    - `updated_at` (string): The timestamp of the last update.
        
    - `amount` (string): The amount shared by the user.
        
- `created_at` (string): The timestamp of creation of the expense group.
    
- `updated_at` (string): The timestamp of the last update of the expense group.
    
- `amount` (string): The total amount of the expense group.
    
- `title` (string): The title of the expense group.
    
- `description` (string): A description of the expense group.
    
- `created_by` (number): The ID of the user who created the expense group.
    
- `group` (number): The ID of the group to which the expense belongs.
